Officers responded to a report of a shooting. Officers were unable to locate any evidence of a shooting during follow-up.  Crime report generated.
Officers responded to a report of a shooting. Upon arrival, officers located evidence of a shooting with no property damage or victims. This remains an active Investigation.
Officers responded to a report of a reckless driver. Upon arrival, officers located the involved vehicle and conducted a traffic enforcement stop. The driver was cited and released.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic enforcement stop on a vehicle. The suspect vehicle immediately fled from officers and a short vehicle pursuit ensued. The suspect vehicle collided with an unoccupied parked car and became disabled. The driver was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a hit and run. Officers located the suspect vehicle. The suspect was arrested on related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a burglary in progress. Upon arrival, officers located and detained the suspect. The suspect was arrested for burglary related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a vandalism. Upon arrival, officers located and detained the suspect. The suspect was arrested for vandalism related charges.

Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and contacted the occupants. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for firearm related charges.

Officers responded to a report of an incomplete emergency call. Upon arrival, officers learned the suspect got into a physical altercation and threatened the victim. The suspect was arrested on related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a robbery and assault at two separate locations. During the investigation, officers identified the suspects and arrested them for related charges.

Officers conducted an enforcement stop and located narcotics and a stolen motorcycle. During the investigation, officers located additional narcotics. The suspect was arrested for theft and narcotic related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a theft. Upon arrival, officers located and attempted to detain the suspect. The suspect physically resisted. Additional officers responded to assist, and the suspect was safely detained. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officer conducted a traffic enforcement stop and contacted the occupants. During the investigation, officers located a firearm and narcotics. Both suspects were arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct a traffic enforcement stop, but the driver failed to yield. A vehicle pursuit ensued. During the pursuit, the suspect’s vehicle became disabled, and the occupants fled from the vehicle. Officers quickly detained the driver and arrested them for theft related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a physical altercation between two individuals. Upon arrival, officers determined that the suspect assaulted the victim with a stick. The suspect was arrested for assault related charges.

Officers responded to a report of a large sideshow involving over 500 vehicles. Upon arrival, officers towed twelve vehicles, issued thirteen citations, and arrested two suspects for pursuit related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a disturbance and vandalism. Upon arrival, officers located and safely detained the suspect. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a single vehicle collision involving an unoccupied parked vehicle. Upon arrival, officers located a male adult with serious injuries. Officers began rendering life-saving efforts on the sole occupant of the vehicle until relieved by Sacramento Fire Department personnel. Despite these efforts, the driver was pronounced deceased at the scene. Based on the circumstances, detectives from the Major Collisions Investigations Unit responded to conduct the investigation.

Officers conducted an investigation and obtained a suspect and suspect vehicle description. Later that evening, SPD officers located the suspect vehicle and safely detained the suspect. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Nothing appeared to be hit by the gunfire, but officers did locate evidence of a shooting. Officers conducted an investigation and a crime report was generated.

Officers contacted a suspect with a felony warrant. The suspect fled on foot and lead officers on a short foot pursuit. Officers were able to safely detain the suspect who was arrested for their warrant and related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Officers located evidence of a shooting. Preliminarily, it does not appear that anything or any persons were hit. Officers conducted an investigation and a crime report was generated.

Officers contacted a subject who was found to be on Post Release Community Supervision (PRCS). During a PRCS search of the subject’s vehicle, the officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to make a traffic stop for a vehicle code violation. The driver failed to yield and fled from officers wrong-way on N. 12th St. Officers immediately canceled the pursuit due to safety. A short time later, officers were made aware of a collision on Highway 160. Officers responded and determined the vehicle involved was the vehicle that fled from them. Through record check, officers determined the suspect vehicle was recently stolen. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers contacted a subject in a vehicle in a parking lot. The subject was found to be on Post Release Community Supervision (PRCS). During a PRCS search of the vehicle, officers located an illegally possessed loaded firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers from our helicopter located an occupied stolen vehicle. Our Air Unit observed two suspects run from the vehicle and hide. Officers eventually located the suspects. The driver was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to a report of an assault. Upon arrival, officers located both the victim and the suspect on scene. The victim sustained non life-threatening injuries and was transported to an area hospital for their injuries. The suspect was arrested for assault related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct an enforcement stop for a vehicle code violation. The suspect initially failed to yield and a pursuit was initiated. The suspect ultimately pulled over and displayed objective signs of intoxication. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted an enforcement stop for reckless driving. During a search of the vehicle, officers located an illegally possessed firearm with an illegal extended magazine. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers contacted a subject in a vehicle. The subject was found to be on parole and a search of the vehicle was conducted. During the search, officers located an illegally possessed firearm with an illegal high-capacity magazine. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to make an enforcement stop for reckless driving. The suspect failed to yield and a pursuit was initiated. The suspects vehicle became immobilized and three passengers fled from the vehicle on foot, but they were quickly detained by our officers. The suspects discarded firearms as they attempted to flee, which were located. The suspects were arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Officers located evidence of a shooting. Fortunately, no persons were struck by gunfire. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.
Please see the following link for a press release regarding this incident: https://apps.sacpd.org/Releases/index.aspx
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The suspect fled from the vehicle on foot but was quickly detained by officers. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a person threatening people with a knife. When officers arrived, the suspect fled in a vehicle. A pursuit was initiated. The pursuit eventually ended in Rocklin, CA where the suspect was detained and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of an attempt carjacking. Victims were in a vehicle when the suspect entered the driver seat and attempted to drive off. After being unsuccessful, the suspect fled. Responding officers located and detained the suspect. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Please see the following link regarding this incident: https://apps.sacpd.org/Releases/liveview.aspx?reference=20230815-048
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Officers located evidence of a shooting. Fortunately, no persons were struck by gunfire. Officers canvassed the area and a report was generated.

Officers attempted to make an enforcement stop for reckless driving. The suspect fled from officers and a pursuit was initiated. The suspect finally yielded to officers and displayed objective signs of intoxication. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers attempted to conduct an enforcement stop. The suspect fled from officers and a pursuit was initiated. The suspect eventually fled from the vehicle on foot, but was located and detained a short time later. The suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. When officers arrived, they observed evidence of a shooting. Fortunately, nobody was injured by the gunfire. Officers canvassed the area and a report was generated.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The suspect was detained without incident and arrested for related charges.
Please see the following Press Release: https://apps.sacpd.org/Releases/liveview.aspx?reference=20230820-050

Officers attempted to conduct an enforcement stop on a vehicle. The suspect fled from officers and a pursuit was initiated. The suspect eventually fled from the vehicle on foot but was detained a short time later. The suspect was found to be in possession of an illegally possessed firearm with a high capacity magazine. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Officers located evidence of a shooting. Fortunately, no persons were struck by gunfire. Officers canvassed the area and a report was generated.

location: 400 Block of W. Silver Eagle Rd
text: Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Officers located evidence of a shooting. Fortunately, no persons were struck by gunfire. Officers canvassed the area and a report was generated.

Officers were in the area and located a stolen vehicle. Officers attempted to conduct an enforcement stop on the vehicle. The vehicle failed to yield, and a pursuit ensued. The vehicle yielded in the area of  Riverside Blvd to Karbet Wy. The driver was arrested and booked on related charges,

location: W EL CAMINO AVE / NORBERT WAY
text: Officers conducted an enforcement stop on a vehicle and contacted the occupants. During the investigation, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The occupants were arrested on related charges.
The victim was assaulted by the suspect, causing moderate injuries. The suspect was located by responding officers. The suspect was arrested and booked for related charges.
Officers responded to a report of a bicycle theft. Officers located and detained the suspect near Broadway / 22nd St. The suspect was cited and released for theft related charges.

Sacramento Police Department bike officers responded to a report of a verbal dispute in the 400 Block of K Street. Upon arrival, bike officers located and detained the suspect sitting nearby. During the investigation, officers located a loaded firearm on the suspect's person. The suspect was arrested on firearm-related charges.
Officers were in the area when they located a stolen vehicle. Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and detained the driver. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers were in the area when they located a stolen vehicle. Officers conducted a traffic enforcement stop and detained the driver. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Link to New Release: https://apps.sacpd.org/Releases/liveview.aspx?reference=20230827-051

location: 2st Avenue / Martin Luther King Jr Blvd
text: Link to News Release: https://apps.sacpd.org/Releases/liveview.aspx?reference=20230827-052
Officers responded to reports of a felony assault. Officers located a victim with non-life-threatening injuries. The suspect was located on scene and arrested for related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a vehicle versus pedestrian collision. Upon arrival, Officers and Sacramento Fire Department Personnel began rendering medical aid on a female adult down in the roadway. Despite their efforts, the female was pronounced deceased by Fire Personnel on scene. The driver remained on scene. The incident is being investigated by our Major Collision Investigation Unit (MCIU).
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Once on scene, officers located evidence of a shooting. Nothing was found to have been hit and no injuries were reported.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Once on scene, officers located evidence of a shooting. Nothing was found to have been hit and no injuries were reported.

location: Town Center Dr / Del Paso Rd
text: Officers proactively contacted an individual who was found to have an outstanding warrant for their arrest. The suspect was arrested and booked for their warrant.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers located a stolen vehicle. As the officers got behind the stolen vehicle, the suspect immediately fled from officers. A short pursuit was initiated and the driver eventually pulled over. The driver was arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a threat with a gun. Officers contacted all parties, located the firearm, and arrested the suspect for threats and firearm related charges.
Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Officers located evidence of a shooting. No injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers responded to reports of a shooting. Officers located evidence of a shooting. Nothing appeared to be struck by gunfire and no injuries were reported. Officers conducted an investigation and a report was generated.

Officers located a stolen vehicle. The vehicle fled from officers and a pursuit was initiated. The occupants of the vehicle later fled from the vehicle but were detained nearby. Officers located an illegally possessed rifle. The driver and passenger were arrested for related charges.

Officers were in the area and located a stolen vehicle. An enforcement stop was conducted, and the driver was detained. During the investigation, officers located a loaded firearm and found that the driver had outstanding warrants. The suspect was later booked at the Sacramento County Main Jail for their warrants and related charges.

Officers were in the area and located a stolen vehicle. Additional officers arrived to assist in conducting an enforcement stop. The vehicle yielded, and the driver was arrested. The driver was later booked at the Sacramento County Main Jail for related charges.
Officers responded to a vehicle collision. Upon arrival, officers contacted the driver, who showed objective signs of intoxication. The driver was later arrested and booked for DUI related charges.
Officers were in the area and located a stolen vehicle. Officers conducted an enforcement stop, and the vehicle yielded. The driver was arrested on related charges.
Officers located an occupied stolen vehicle. The suspect was detained and during a search, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
Officers located a stolen vehicle. The suspect was detained and arrested for related charges.
Officers responded to a stolen property report. Upon arrival, officers located the suspect with the stolen property in the area. The suspect was arrested on related charges.

Officers responded to reports of a stabbing. Responding officers provided medical aid to the victim and located the fleeing suspect nearby. The victim sustained a non-life-threatening injury and the suspect was arrested for related charges.

Officers conducted an enforcement stop for a vehicle code violation. The driver was found to be a parolee-at-large and during a search of the suspect, officers located an illegally possessed firearm. The suspect was arrested for related charges.
